parameters:
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>Flare, I have high hopes for you. But please, don't overdo
it.
\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Flare>Yes, I'll do my best to meet your expectations!!
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0009]\N<Eliza>Oh, you've arrived? Is there something you wish to ask?
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0007]\N<Eliza>What is "Love"... Hmm, that's a difficult question...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>It's a form of energy that our organization has only
recently discovered. It seems to be generated during acts of
love, transforming emotions into energy...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>...Well, to be frank, even we don't fully understand what it
is (laughs).

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0007]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0006]\N<Eliza>Well, it should be fine. If it were truly dangerous to the
body, humanity, which has thrived through sex and
reproduction, would have been extinct long ago.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0007]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>It is said that the surge of emotions during sexual activity
could be the source of this energy. As long as we don't
collect or use it recklessly, it should be fine.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>The crystal is a transformation item developed by our
organization. Those who transform using this crystal are
called Pure Elements.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>By transforming with the energy of love, "Love", one can
temporarily strengthen and activate their body.
Additionally, the transformation and detransformation
process also has the effect of cleansing the body.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>Therefore, it enables ordinary humans to fight against
monsters, which they normally wouldn't stand a chance
against.

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Flare>I see! By the way, who decided on the poses and catchphrases
when transforming?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0004]\N<Eliza>(Who decided? There's no script for this... It's just
something Flare came up with on the fly...)

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0004]\N<Eliza>(This kid must have a latent desire to become a
transformation heroine. Denying it now and dampening her
spirits isn't wise. Let's just go along with it...)

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0011]\N<Eliza>Uh, well, that is... um. Perhaps, when you transform, you
automatically say those things... maybe?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0011]\N<Eliza>(By the way, the design of the transformation outfit is also
based on the individual's subconscious... Well, it's
fine...)

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Flare>I would like to be briefed again about our battle
situation...
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>Hmm, right. Let's do a quick review...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>Our enemy is an organization threatening our peace, known as
"Black Blizzard". Commonly referred to as "BB Group".

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>As an organization opposing the evil "BB Group", we are the
Justice Knights, commonly known as "JK".

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>The monsters from BB Group are beyond the capabilities of
ordinary people. Those who can counter them... That's where
you, "Pure Flame", come in.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>We were losing battle after battle with no way to stop the
monsters... But with your arrival, we finally achieved a
precious victory.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0000]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0006]\N<Eliza>Moreover, to transform into Pure Flame, you need the power
of love, "Love". You'll need to get cozy with your boyfriend
and stock up on energy♪
